title: Appreciation thread for Bobsongoats
body:
Hey Bob, i just wanna thank you for all you did man. Long story short, my cousin ended up buying blitz while i was out for dinner, and I was saving up for jhin so i could play it next week since i have winter break. Bob came in clutch and helped refund that purchase, and he is literally a GOD!!!!   Thanks so much for saving my winter break, now i could play with some of my bros and have fun :D


I hope one of the helpers in riot could send this to you man, more love <3

replies.body: Bobsongoats rocks!  I'll be sure to pass on the accolade, thanks friend!
